title: Playbook Definition
description: Schema for regis-cli playbook definition files (YAML or JSON).

description.description: Human-readable description of what this playbook evaluates.

slug.description: Short identifier used for HTML report filename generation.

links.description: Optional custom links to display as actions for this playbook.

url.description: URL template which can use {metadata[key]} placeholders

pages.description: List of playbook pages. Each page groups sections.

sections.description: List of playbook sections. Each section groups scorecards, levels, and display preferences.

slug.description: Short identifier used for HTML report filename generation. If not provided, it falls back to the playbook slug.

section.description: A playbook section containing scorecards, optional levels, and display preferences.

hint.description: Optional informative text displayed below the section name.

levels.description: Priority/severity levels used to group scorecards. Built-in fallback order exists for bronze, silver, gold.

widgets.description: KPI and Template widgets displayed in the section.

condition.description: Optional jsonLogic expression to conditionally display this section. If it evaluates to falsy, the section is hidden.

analyzers.description: List of analyzer names whose output should be embedded in this section.

widgets.description: KPI widgets displayed in the section header.

widget.description: A key-value widget displaying a metric from the analysis report, or a custom HTML template widget.

value.description: Dot-separated path into the report data, e.g. 'results.trivy.critical_count'.

url.description: Optional URL for the widget. Supports Jinja2 templates.

icon.description: Emoji or icon displayed alongside the widget.

template.description: Path to a Jinja2 HTML template within the theme, e.g. analyzers/trivy/table.html.

options.description: Arbitrary options passed directly to the Jinja2 template.

title.description: Optional title for the widget. If provided, the widget will be displayed with a header.

collapsed.description: If true, the widget will be collapsible and closed by default.

align.description: Text alignment for the widget (left, center, or right)

subvalue.description: Additional text/value to display below the main value. Follows identical resolution logic as value.

class.description: Additional CSS class(es) to apply to the widget container.

condition.description: Optional jsonLogic expression to conditionally display this widget. If it evaluates to falsy, the widget is hidden.

level.description: A priority/severity level used to group and summarise scorecards.

order.description: Sort order (lower value = higher priority). Built-in defaults: bronze=1, silver=2, gold=3.

scorecard.description: An evaluation scorecard with a JsonLogic condition.

title.description: Human-readable title. Defaults to name if omitted.

level.description: Level this scorecard belongs to. Must match a level name defined in the section.

tags.description: Arbitrary tags for filtering or grouping.

condition.description: JsonLogic expression evaluated against the flattened analysis report. Variables use dot-paths, e.g. {"var": "results.trivy.critical_count"}. Supported operators: ==, !=, >, >=, <, <=, in, !, and, or.
